title: Majoring in Milk
description:
Jenny is only eighteen years old and still 
innocent
, but she lives in poverty on a dairy farm. She gets a chance to go to college, but little does she know, she's not going to be a typical coed. Instead, she's been 
tricked
 by handsome Dr. Lechon into becoming a 
feeding assistant
 at the university he runs.  What does she feed? Milk, of course. The creamy beverage she feeds to dominant older men is flowing from her buxom chest. But that's not all the fun the doctor and medical staff have as they drink their fill and then fill her up, and you'd better believe it's all done hard and without protection.  The story takes you through Jenny's first time experience and many taboo treats, including bareback group pleasures and double penetration menages, all while nursing hungry men.  If you love dairy erotica and can handle graphic scenes of cream drenched sex and milking fantasies, enroll in Hucow U and start studying today.  You'll also get a free bonus excerpt from book two, Football Players Love Milk in which Jenny gets rough treatment from the football team.
author: Jezebel Divelle
